sentences.en: “Treasury borrowing of existing savings would drive up the interest rate and choke off economic activity”(&b{Paul Craig Roberts})
sentences.cn: “国库从现有储蓄中借款会迫使利率上升和使经济活动停滞”(&b{保罗·克雷格·罗伯茨})

sentences.en: A small child could choke on the doll's hair.
sentences.cn: 洋娃娃的头发可能会让小孩窒息。

sentences.en: Be aware that the infant will cough, sputter, and choke during feedings.
sentences.cn: 注意小儿在吃奶时会咳嗽, 喷溅或呛噎.

sentences.en: Choke her until she showed the whites of her eyes!
sentences.cn: 掐!掐!一直到她翻了白眼!

sentences.en: choked back his tears.
sentences.cn: 忍住他的眼泪

sentences.en: He started to choke as he was eating too fast.
sentences.cn: 他吃得太快,噎住了.

sentences.en: Horse 's narrow esophagus results in repeated choke.
sentences.cn: 马的食道狭窄，常常引起食道阻塞。

sentences.en: I attempted to choke down supper. .
sentences.cn: 我试着强咽下晚饭。

sentences.en: I felt as if there was a weight on my chest, choking me.
sentences.cn: 我感觉好像有重物压在胸口，让我喘不过气来。

sentences.en: It's enough to make them choke with apoplectic rage.
sentences.cn: 足以气得让他们说不出话来。

sentences.en: Kempton made an inarticulate noise at the back of his throat as if he were about to choke.
sentences.cn: 肯普顿嗓子眼里发出含混的声音，仿佛他要窒息了。

sentences.en: Liz was choking back her anger.
sentences.cn: 莉兹拼命压住怒气。

sentences.en: She kept talking and nobody could choke her off.
sentences.cn: 她说个不停,没人能阻止她.

sentences.en: Six people choked to death on the fumes.
sentences.cn: 六人被烟呛死。

sentences.en: The automatic choke devices are all similar, although they vary in detail.
sentences.cn: 自动阻风门尽管在细节上有所不同,但其设计是相仿的.

sentences.en: The brandy made him choke, but it restored his nerve.
sentences.cn: 虽说白兰地呛了他一下，却让他恢复了勇气。

sentences.en: The coffee was almost too hot to swallow and made him choke for a moment.
sentences.cn: 咖啡烫得几乎咽不下去，呛得他好一会儿喘不过气来。

sentences.en: The fish bone in her throat made her choke.
sentences.cn: 她喉咙中的鱼骨使她哽噎.

sentences.en: The smoke was choking me.
sentences.cn: 烟呛得我呼吸困难。

sentences.en: They warned the Chancellor that raising taxes in the Budget could choke off the recovery.
sentences.cn: 他们警告财政大臣说，预算中税收的提高将阻碍经济复苏。

sentences.en: This partly opens the choke so that an overich mixture is prevented.
sentences.cn: 这种阻风门的部分开启可以防止混合气过浓.

sentences.en: Weeds were choking the stream.
sentences.cn: 野草将溪流堵塞了。

sentences.en: When she learned the sad news, she found it hard to choke back her tears.
sentences.cn: 当她得知那个悲痛的消息时, 泪水止不住夺眶而出.

words.tran_cn: 令人窒息的；透不过气来的
宽领带；窒息物；短项炼；被窒息的人
阻塞；使…窒息；抑制（choke的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 抑制，劝阻：象扼住喉咙一样使…停止
哽咽，噎住，阻塞：因感情激动而说不出话来

trans.tran_cn: 阻风门，窒息，哽咽声，呛住声
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment in a vehicle that controls the amount of air going into the engine, and that is used to help the engine start
to be unable to breathe properly because something is in your throat or there is not enough air

trans.tran_cn: 使噎住，使窒息，使哽咽，掐死，勒死，阻塞，塞满，失灵
trans.tran_en: to be unable to breathe properly because something is in your throat or there is not enough air
to be unable to breathe properly because something is in your throat or there is not enough air
to be unable to breathe properly because something is in your throat or there is not enough air

trans.tran_cn: 使窒息； 塞满， 塞住
trans.tran_en: to fill a place so that things cannot move through it
